insert exchange_rates
query:
insert into public.exchange_rates 
(bid, ask, trendask, trendbid, date, ccy_id, base_ccy_id, source_id) 
values 
('{{msg.payload.buy}}', '{{msg.payload.sale}}', null, null, now(), 
(select cc.id from public.currency_code cc where cc.ccy='{{msg.payload.ccy}}'), 
(select cc.id from public.currency_code cc where cc.ccy='{{msg.payload.base_ccy}}'), 
(select c.id from public.source c where c.source='privatbank'));

name: select last add exchange_rates
query:
SELECT SOURCE.source                                      AS source
     , CURENCY_CODE.ccy                                   AS ccy_code
     , CURENCY_CODE_BASE.ccy                              AS ccy_code_base

     , (avg(LAST_HOUR.bid)::numeric(10, 2) - DAY_AGO.bid) AS trend_bid_day
     , (avg(LAST_HOUR.asK)::numeric(10, 2) - DAY_AGO.ask) AS trend_asc_day

     , avg(LAST_HOUR.bid)::numeric(10, 2)                 AS bid_last_hour
     , avg(LAST_HOUR.ask)::numeric(10, 2)                 AS ask_last_hour

     , max(date_trunc('minute', LAST_HOUR.date))          AS date_last_hour
--      , ((avg(LAST_HOUR.bid) + avg(LAST_HOUR.ask)) / 2)::numeric(10, 2) AS avg_last_hour
--
--      , (avg(LAST_HOUR.bid)::numeric(10, 2) - HOUR_AGO.bid)             AS trend_bid_hour
--      , (avg(LAST_HOUR.asK)::numeric(10, 2) - HOUR_AGO.ask)             AS trend_asc_hour
--
--      , HOUR_AGO.bid                                                    AS bid_hour_ago
--      , HOUR_AGO.ask                                                    AS ask_hour_ago
--      , HOUR_AGO.date                                                   AS date_hour_ago

--      , DAY_AGO.bid                                                     AS bid_day_ago
--      , DAY_AGO.ask                                                     AS ask_day_ago
--      , DAY_AGO.date_day                                                AS date_day_ago

FROM public.exchange_rates LAST_HOUR
         LEFT OUTER JOIN public.currency_code CURENCY_CODE ON (LAST_HOUR.ccy_id = CURENCY_CODE.id)
         LEFT OUTER JOIN public.source SOURCE ON (LAST_HOUR.source_id = SOURCE.id)
         LEFT OUTER JOIN public.currency_code CURENCY_CODE_BASE ON (LAST_HOUR.base_ccy_id = CURENCY_CODE_BASE.id)
         LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT avg(bid)::numeric(10, 2)   AS bid,
                                 avg(ask)::numeric(10, 2)   AS ask,
                                 date_trunc('minute', date) AS date,
                                 ccy_id                     AS ccy_id,
                                 base_ccy_id                AS base_ccy_id
                          FROM public.exchange_rates
                          WHERE date::timestamp >= date_trunc('minute', (now()::timestamp - '2 hour'::interval))
                            AND date::timestamp < date_trunc('minute', (now()::timestamp - '1 hour'::interval))
                          GROUP BY bid, ask, date, ccy_id, base_ccy_id) HOUR_AGO
                         ON (LAST_HOUR.ccy_id = HOUR_AGO.ccy_id AND
                             LAST_HOUR.base_ccy_id = HOUR_AGO.base_ccy_id)

         LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT avg(bid)::numeric(10, 2)                    AS bid
                               , avg(ask)::numeric(10, 2)                    AS ask
                               , ((avg(bid) + avg(ask)) / 2)::numeric(10, 2) AS cours
                               , ccy_id                                      AS ccy_id
                               , base_ccy_id                                 AS base_ccy
                               , date_part('day', date)                      AS date_day
                          FROM exchange_rates
                          WHERE date::timestamp >= date_trunc('day', current_timestamp - interval '1 day')
                            AND date::timestamp < date_trunc('day', current_timestamp)
                          GROUP BY ccy_id, base_ccy_id, date_day) DAY_AGO
                         ON (LAST_HOUR.ccy_id = DAY_AGO.ccy_id)

WHERE LAST_HOUR.date::timestamp >= date_trunc('minute', (now()::timestamp - '1 hour'::interval))
  AND LAST_HOUR.date::timestamp < date_trunc('minute', now()::timestamp)

GROUP BY ccy_code
       , source
       , curency_code_base.ccy
       , day_ago.bid
       , day_ago.ask
